results.title: A New Era for Genome Editing in Gene Therapy and Stem ...
results.content: # Advancements In CRISPR-CAS9: A New Era for Genome Editing in Gene Therapy and Stem Cell Applications. CRISPR-Cas9, Gene Therapy, Stem Cell Research, Ethical Implications, Genome Editing, Public Perception, Genetic Disorders, Ethical Governance. **Purpose:** This study explores the advancements in CRISPR-Cas9 technology and its potential to revolutionize gene therapy and stem cell applications. The questionnaire consisted of sections covering demographic data, awareness of CRISPR-Cas9, its potential in gene therapy, ethical considerations, and its role in stem cell research. Lotfi, M., et al., Recent advances in CRISPR/Cas9 delivery approaches for therapeutic gene editing of stem cells. Tao, R., et al., Revolutionizing cancer treatment: enhancing CAR-T cell therapy with CRISPR/Cas9 gene editing technology. Advancements In CRISPR-CAS9: A New Era for Genome Editing in Gene Therapy and Stem Cell Applications.

results.title: CRISPR-Cas9: From lab breakthrough to clinical reality
results.content: At its core, CRISPR‑Cas9 is a programmable gene‑editing system adapted from a bacterial immune mechanism. A guide RNA directs the Cas9 nuclease
